member.name: P:vbStripe.My.Resources.Resources.Culture

member.name: M:vbStripe.vbstripe.create_Customer(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create A new customer. No information is required, I would suggest using email address just to have some kind of information attached to the customer. If you provide a Credit Card Number you need to provide the expiration information.
member.param: Credit Card Number: The card number, as a string without any separators.
Credit Card Expiration Month: Two digit number representing the card's expiration month.
Credit Card Expiration Year: Four digit number representing the card's expiration year.
Credit Card CVC: Card security code
Name on Credit Card: Cardholder's full name.
Credit Card Address1 on File, optional
Credit Card Address2 on File, optional
Credit Card Zip on File, optional
Credit Card State on File, optional
Credit Card Country on File, optional
An arbitrary string which you can attach to a customer object. It is displayed alongside the customer in the web interface.
If you provide a coupon code, the customer will have a discount applied on all recurring charges. Charges you create through the API will not have the discount.
The customer's email address. It is displayed alongside the customer in the web interface and can be useful for searching and tracking.
The identifier of the plan to subscribe the customer to. If provided, the returned customer object has a 'subscription' attribute describing the state of the customer's subscription.

UTC integer timestamp representing the end of the trial period the customer will get before being charged for the first time. If set, trial_end will override the default trial period of the plan the customer is being subscribed to.

member.name: M:vbStripe.vbstripe.deleteCustomer(System.String)
member.param: The identifier of the customer to be deleted.
member.returns: Boolean - true = Deleted | false = something went wrong

member.name: M:vbStripe.vbstripe.refundCharge(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a refund for any charge that has taken place.
member.param: The identifier of the charge to be refunded.
OPTIONAL, A positive integer in cents representing how much of this charge to refund. Can only refund up to the unrefunded amount remaining of the charge.
